title: Replay on Max
body:
Hey Fellas,
i just had an unbelievable game and now I want to show it some people, but i can't open my League of Legends Folder to take the data out. I could just Screenvideo and let it play in Client can someone tell me how to get the code so i can send to other people pls??

Edit: I mean Mac not Max

replies.body:
I believe you're trying to create a *highlight*, which you can do by hopping into the Beta Client, visit your profile, head to *Match History* and then hit the download replay button next to the match. You can then launch into the replay with the new button that replaced the download button and record any snippet with the *record* button at the bottom of the navigation bar in-game during the replay. Once you finish recording the replay, a message will pop up with the exact location of where it's saved.

Let me know if you have any questions.
